name.description: Name that identifies this ML model.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this ML model. It could be title or label from the source services

description.description: Description of the ML model instance. How it was trained and for what it is used.

algorithm.description: Algorithm used to train the ML Model

mlFeatures.description: Features used to train the ML Model.

target.description: For supervised ML Models, the value to estimate.

mlHyperParameters.description: Hyper Parameters used to train the ML Model.

dashboard.description: Performance Dashboard URL to track metric evolution

mlStore.description: Location containing the ML Model. It can be a storage layer and/or a container repository.

server.description: Endpoint that makes the ML Model available, e.g,. a REST API serving the data or computing predictions.
